content.stimulus_en: People (live) ________ on Mars one day.
The weather (not/be) ________ very good.
Maybe I (be) ________ famous.
I don't think they (win) ________.
I think it (rain) ________ tomorrow.
Will you ________ (help) me?
They won't be happy with the news.
Will drive people flying cars in the future?
I hope you will enjoy the concert.
She definitely will pass her exams.
I think technology will change our lives completely.
It probably will be a very cold winter.
